title: Full Time Appointment Setter
job_overview:
Remote B2C Appointment Setter (Full-Time) – Home Services Position

We’re looking for a sharp, dependable, and conversationally skilled B2C Appointment Setter to join our growing marketing consulting agency. We work with contractors and remodeling companies to generate high-quality leads—and your job is to help turn those leads into booked in-home estimates.

This is NOT cold calling. All leads are warm (inbound or ad-based). Your role is to call, qualify, and schedule the right prospects.

???? You must be:
- Fluent in English with strong confidence and clarity

- Able to work full-time in US Eastern Standard Time (EST) hours

- Skilled in handling objections, building rapport, and staying calm on the phone

- Committed — not flaky. We want serious professionals looking for long-term work

- Familiar with GoHighLevel (GHL) or confident in learning fast

- Tech-savvy and reliable with a quiet work environment



???? What You’ll Do:
- Call warm leads quickly (speed to lead = ????)

- Ask qualifying questions (training provided)

- Book appointments directly into the calendar

- Confirm and reschedule appointments when needed

- Take great notes and update lead statuses in GHL

- Report daily performance and communication logs


???? Requirements:
- Experience in sales, appointment setting, or customer service

- Clear spoken English and good energy on calls

- Fast internet, headset, and backup power/internet preferred

- Experience with CRMs, GoHighLevel, or similar tools (a major plus)


Compensation: We’re open to skill-based tiers:

- Base pay: $600–$800/month USD (depending on experience)

- Bonuses: $5–$15 per show-up or booked appointment depending on quality

- Performance growth: Opportunities to grow to $1,000+/month with consistent results

How to Apply:
Apply here ????  Upgrade to see actual info

We are excited to grow with you!
